headlines.headline: Stephen A.: The Bucks need to wake up and trade Giannis
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith emphatically believes it's time for the Bucks and Giannis Antetokounmpo to break up, calling for Milwaukee to trade him.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: Don't be surprised if ... Cooper Flagg finishes as a top-25 fantasy option, Jalen Green averages 20 PPG
headlines.description: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from notable players such as Cooper Flagg, Jalen Green, Jonathan Kuminga and more.

headlines.headline: Remembering Kobe's 81-point night 20 years on
headlines.description: Check out this "SportsCenter" flashback on the 20th anniversary of Kobe Bryant's 81-point game against the Toronto Raptors.

headlines.headline: NBA to bring more games to Abu Dhabi in extended partnership
headlines.description: The NBA and Abu Dhabi's department of culture and tourism have extended their partnership, with the league agreeing to continue bringing preseason games to the Middle East.

headlines.headline: What are the biggest blowouts in NBA history?
headlines.description: The New York Knicks beat the Brooklyn Nets for their largest lopsided win in franchise history in 2026. Find out more about other big NBA blowouts.

headlines.headline: Orlovsky loves Ben Johnson's offseason mindset for Bears
headlines.description: Dan Orlovsky, Ryan Hawkins and Mike Greenberg discuss Ben Johnson's mindset heading into the Bears' offseason.

headlines.headline: Who should be the NFL MVP?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew debates the NFL MVP race, with Matthew Stafford and Drake Maye in contention.

headlines.headline: Greeny: Stafford is HOF lock if he wins Super Bowl, MVP
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew breaks down what another Super Bowl title and an MVP award would mean for Matthew Stafford's legacy.

headlines.headline: Christian McCaffrey, 4 QBs named AP NFL MVP finalists
headlines.description: Christian McCaffrey is the first player to be a finalist for three AP NFL awards in the same year, joining Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford in the running for The Associated Press 2025 NFL Most Valuable Player award.

headlines.headline: Orlovsky rips 'immature' Bills owner for Keon Coleman comments
headlines.description: Dan Orlovsky, Andrew Hawkins and Adam Schefter lay into Bills owner Terry Pegula over "immature" comments made about WR Keon Coleman.

headlines.headline: Sources: Buccaneers finalizing deal with Zac Robinson as OC
headlines.description: The Buccaneers are finalizing a deal to hire former Falcons offensive coordinator Zac Robinson as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Why Frank Nazar is the perfect complement to Connor Bedard
headlines.description: The 22-year-old center is slated to make his return Thursday to a team still fighting to get in the playoff mix.
